alert.note: Alert for Lowndes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 9:32AM CDT until March 26 at 10:25AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus affecting Lowndes County. Tibbee Creek Near Tibbee affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Water is flowing over Gunshoot Road near steens. Low lying areas along sand road, black creek road, and near yellow creek are flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 16.1 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Luxapallila Creek Columbus 15.0 10.0 Wed 9 am CDT 15.1 15.9 12.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
